function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Age-related reduced travel leading to containment effect on COVID-19 cases in neighboring areas.","Impact":"Higher risk of uncontrolled spread of COVID-19 in areas with higher mean age.","Mitigation":"Encourage safe travel practices for all age groups, including the elderly, and monitor border crossings to prevent potential spread.","Technologies":"Border monitoring systems, travel tracking apps, and public health surveillance systems.","People":"Elderly population, neighboring communities, and travelers.","Owner":"Government authorities, public health agencies, and local communities."},{"Description":"High mobility of dependents across county borders leading to positive spillover effects of COVID-19 cases.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission due to high mobility of dependents across county borders.","Mitigation":"Implement strict travel restrictions and quarantine measures for individuals crossing county borders, as well as promoting local economic activities to reduce the need for cross-border travel.","Technologies":"Quarantine monitoring systems, travel restriction apps, and local economic development initiatives.","People":"Dependents, travelers, and neighboring communities.","Owner":"Government authorities, local businesses, and public health agencies."},{"Description":"Increased patient traffic across regional borders due to density of doctors leading to positive spillover effects of COVID-19 cases.","Impact":"Higher risk of cross-border spread of COVID-19 due to increased patient traffic across regional borders.","Mitigation":"Strengthen coordination between healthcare facilities in neighboring regions, implement strict infection control measures, and promote telemedicine to reduce unnecessary cross-border travel.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, cross-border healthcare coordination systems, and infection control technologies.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and neighboring communities.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health departments, and public health agencies."}]}
